overview: Karl Peterson, an old farmer, living alone in his poor house in a neglected village of Uus-Kiislova, PÃµlva county, where his household once bloomed. Despite the war, deportations, collectivization, distrainment and other crimes agains humanity Karl never joined the collective farm. He was terrorized, abused and imprisoned but he remained true to himself.
title: Cogito, ergo sum
